message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm willing to part with it for $20,000.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but my budget is limited. I am willing to pay up to $10,000 for the product.
Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your budget constraints, but $10,000 is too low for me.  How about we meet in the middle at $17,000?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your response. I still believe that $10,000 is a fair price for the product. I would like to stick to that figure.
Bob, I appreciate you sticking to your budget, but I'm still finding it hard to meet that number.  Perhaps we can agree on $15,000. This is my final offer.
Hello Alice, I understand your position, but unfortunately, I cannot go beyond $10,000. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.
